data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Short, Andrew Edward Z., García, Mauricio (2014): A new genus of egg case-carrying water scavenger beetle from the Guiana Shield (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae: Acidocerinae). Zootaxa 3835 (2): 251-262, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3835.2.5
